power.title: Blazing Pursuit
power.fluff: You envelop your blade in fire and then strike, the flames creating a lingering path that you can travel along to catch your escaping foe

section.text: Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (Will):
section.text: If the target is within 5 squares of you at the end of its next turn, you can use a free reaction to teleport to a space that is adjacent to the target. You do not need line of sight to the target or the space you teleport into.
